title: Marriage
brief_description: An historical look at the instruction of marriage and the changing role of women within marriage leads to an examination of marriage in contemporary society. Sociologist Jessie Bernard provides an insight into marriage relationships, a Catholic priest lectures to engaged Catholic couples, and a marriage counsellor helps a couple to communicate.
